verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It tells me what my Father has, In store for ev’ry day, And, tho I tread a darksome path, Yields sunshine all the way.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It tells of One whose loving heart, Can feel my deepest woe, Who in each sorrow bears a part, That none can bear below.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!{/lang-eng}
